name: boarding
description: Noboarding - Remote onboarding flow management platform

scripts.sync: cp sdk/src/types.ts dashboard/lib/sdk/ && cp sdk/src/variableUtils.ts dashboard/lib/sdk/ && echo '✅ SDK files synced to dashboard (ElementRenderer skipped - has web-specific icon modifications)'
scripts.sync:full: cp sdk/src/components/ElementRenderer.tsx dashboard/lib/sdk/ && cp sdk/src/types.ts dashboard/lib/sdk/ && cp sdk/src/variableUtils.ts dashboard/lib/sdk/ && sed -i '' "s|from '../types'|from './types'|g" dashboard/lib/sdk/ElementRenderer.tsx && sed -i '' "s|from '../variableUtils'|from './variableUtils'|g" dashboard/lib/sdk/ElementRenderer.tsx && echo '⚠️  WARNING: ElementRenderer synced - you need to manually re-add web icon support!'
scripts.dev: npm run sync && concurrently "npm run sync:watch" "npm run dev --prefix dashboard"
